law.catch_line: Advertising by public agencies -- Rates charged.
law.text: Notwithstanding KRS 65.070, 83A.060, 91A.040, 160.463, 424.180, 424.190, 424.220, 424.230, 424.250, 424.260, 424.270, 424.330, any public agency required to advertise or publish notices or documents in a newspaper shall be charged the lowest rate generally charged for advertising by the newspaper.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 11, effective June 20, 2005.
